heading: Baggage
parag: All about your luggage, such as what you can and cannot bring and what to do if something goes wrong.

heading: Deals and destinations
parag: Searching for the best deals on flights, hotels, and more? Don't miss out on our offers to worldwide top destinations!

heading: Find your destination
parag: Not sure where to go on your next trip? Get inspired by our travel guide and find the perfect destination!

heading: Ticket options and services
parag: Check our ticket for groups, kids, or students, and read all about travelling by public transport or our available payment methods.

heading: Managing your booking
parag: Check how to change, upgrade, or cancel your flight, and how to make a name correction.

heading: Extra options for your trip
parag: Check out all our add-on options, to make your next flight with us just a litle extra special.

heading: Refund and compensation
parag: If your flight was delayed or cancelled, or your baggage was delayed or damaged, you might be eligible for a refund or compensation.

heading: Travel documents
parag: Check which travel documents you need to bring for a smooth start of your trip.

heading: At the airport
parag: When you can drop off your baggage, where the lounges are, and what travel documents to bring.

heading: Onboard experience and services
parag: What to expect during your flight: seat meals, WiFi, and all other onboard services.

heading: Travelling with kids
parag: Here's everything you need to know for a stress-free flight and preparation for your children.

heading: Travelling with pets
parag: Make a reservation for your dog or cat and prepare them for their journey in the carbin or hold.

heading: Assistance and health
parag: Whether you need a wheelchair or want to know what to do for a child travelling alone, we'll help you out.

heading: Sustainability
parag: Being an airline comes with a responsibility. Here's our commitment to creating a more sustainable future for aviation.

heading: Contact us
parag: We're here to help you with any questions or requests. Reach out to the KLM Customer Contact Centre.

heading: Flight status
parag: Check out our flight tracker for live updates on all flights, up to 60 days in advance.

heading: Travel alerts
parag: Stay up to date about alerts and distruptions of our flight schedule that may affect your trip.

heading: COVID-19
parag: Travelling during COVID-19 requires more preparation than you are used to. We've listed all information you need for a safe and pleasant trip.

heading: Stay informed
parag: Receive real-time flight updates, subscribe to our newsletter, follow us on social media, or download the KLM app to manage your trip.

heading: Bulletin board
parag: Stay up to date about new destinations, departure airports in your country, new aircraft types, and more.

heading: Flying Blue
parag: Join Flying Blue to earn Miles every time you fly and to enjoy benefits.

heading: Business travel
parag: Take off for business with KLM and Air France. We provide a range of tailor-made solutions.
